articles.title: Why ESA and NASA's SOHO Spacecraft Spots So Many Comets - NASA
articles.description: The Solar and Heliospheric Observatory, a joint mission between ESA (European Space Agency) and NASA, was not designed to find comets, but it has discovered well over half of all known comets, with nearly 4,000 comets found.
